abstract.p: The OliPerformance component can transform problem data into a Datashop formatted csv file with student performance on oli courses.
The required input fields are three checkboxes for if the user wants to include the specified csv file in the output zip file.

There is one type of output: a zip file called ResultFiles. The zip file contains three csvs: activities_per_module.csv, student_quiz.csv, and student_act.csv. The first csv (activities_per_module) sorts oli questions from each module into "Did I get this" and "Learn By Doing". The second csv (student_quiz) shows student performance relative to attempts, final score, quiz score, first attempt correct, and quiz steps by problem heirarchy. The third csv (student_act) shows student performance relative to incorrect attempts, correct attemps, first attempts, problems, and ls by problem heirarchy on activities. Datashop help

info.description: This component allows you to transform student problem data into a Datashop formatted zip file.
info.inputs: Tab-delimited problem file. See Abstract section for required fields.
info.outputs: Tab-delimited csv file containing student performance data on oli questions and activities.
